title: The Science of Farming
text: Soil nutrient assessment. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. Sprayer calibration prevents over application. We start work before sunrise during harvest. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. In winter we protect equipment from freezing. We rotate pastures to improve forage quality. We record yields and monitor feed intake. Farm safety rules are part of our routine. We design protocols for herd health management. The tractor needs a safety check before operation. We assess soil nutrients for fertilization plans. We interpret telemetry from precision agriculture systems.
